articles.title: Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian President
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Saturday sent a message of greetings to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The message said:
					
					 On the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation, I extend greetings to you and the Russian people and express belief that the relations between the DPRK and the Russian Federation will develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Saturday received a message of greetings from  Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the day of Korea's liberation. 
					 The message said:
					
					 Esteemed Your Excellency Kim Jong Il, 
					
					 Please accept my sincerest felicitations to you on the day of Korea's liberation, the national holiday of the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean people achieved freedom and independence through a heroic struggle against colonialism.
					
					 We appreciate the fact that the DPRK sets store by the memory of the soldiers of the Soviet Army who laid down their lives in the battles for crushing Japanese militarism in the Far East.
					
					 Esteemed Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,  
					
					 Please accept my best wishes for your good health and happiness and the Korean people's peace and prosperity.
					
					 Respectfully Yours.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Russian President
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of the Russian Federation, on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 Expressing the belief that the relations between the DPRK and the Russian Federation would develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, Kim wished the president success in his work.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President
					 Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 Seen standing before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statue of the President amid the playing of the floral basket-laying music were  floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, KPA units, scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools, etc. and bouquets and flowers.
					
					Also placed was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. The ribbons of the floral baskets bore letters "The Great Leader Comrade
						 Kim Il Sung Will Live Forever," "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" and "The Great Revolutionary Exploits of the Respected Leader Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Will Be Immortal!"
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the President in deep reverence. 
					
					 Floral tribute was also paid to the statues of the President at various units in Pyongyang and in local places.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the People's Army and people from all walks of life visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Saturday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The visitors paid highest tribute to the statue of the President Kim Il Sung who led the great anti-Japanese war to victory, achieving the historic cause of liberating the country, and laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the nation, expressing ardent longing and profound reverence for him. 
					
					 Then they paid homage to the President who dedicated his whole life to the freedom and happiness of the people, the prosperity of the country and the accomplishment of the socialist cause.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Liberation Towers and Cemeteries of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Liberation Towers and Cemeteries of Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Alexander Matsegora, Russian charge d'affaires ad interim here, and staff members of his embassy Saturday laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on the occasion of August 15, the day of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there were diplomatic envoys of various countries.
					
					 Laid before the tower was a wreath in the name of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to fallen fighters of the Soviet Army before going round the tower.
					
					 Then they laid a wreath before the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					Meanwhile, members of the Russian embassy laid bouquets before the liberation towers, statues of the Soviet Army, cemeteries of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army and the monument to fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in local areas.

articles.title: Great Feat of Kim Il Sung in Building Revolutionary Force of Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Great Feat of Kim Il Sung in Building Revolutionary Force of Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean people take the 64th anniversary of the national liberation (August 15) to recollect the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung who created the original Songun idea for the first time in history, built up a revolutionary armed force and accomplished the cause of national liberation by force of arms.
					 He, shouldering the destiny of the country and nation, embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and put forth the line of anti-Japanese armed struggle at the historical Kalun Meeting, clarifying overall strategic and tactical problems for the Korean revolution.
					
					 In July of Juche 19 (1930) the Korean Revolutionary Army was formed in the course of implementing the Juche-oriented line and policies set forth at the Kalun Meeting.
					
					 The President dispatched small groups of the KRA to northern area of Korea, the central Manchuria and other areas to carry out at an early date the tasks at the preparatory stage for the anti-Japanese armed struggle, such as expanding of the ranks, accumulating of experience in military activities and securing of activity bases and weapons.
					
					 He came to Jongsong County (at that time) where he convened and presided over a meeting of political workers and chiefs of underground revolutionary organizations in May 1931. At the meeting he delivered the speech "Let Us Prepare Fully the Revolutionary Force for Organizing and Waging Armed Struggle."
					
					 He, in his speech, set forth tasks to fully prepare revolutionary force for the armed struggle and detailed the way for building up solid armed forces, uniting popular masses of broad sections into a political force and securing bases of the armed units.
					
					 The backbone for founding the anti-Japanese armed ranks was trained, the mass foundation was laid and full military preparation was made within two years after the formation of the KRA.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, basing himself on this, founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army in April 1932, defeated the Japanese imperialists and liberated the country.
					
					 The great feat performed by President Kim Il Sung to accomplish the historic cause of national liberation will last forever.

articles.title: Day of Korea's Liberation Editorially Observed
articles.content:
Day of Korea's Liberation Editorially Observed
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Saturday dedicate editorials to the 64th anniversary of the liberation of Korea. They call for successfully accomplishing President
					 Kim Il Sung's cause of building a rich and powerful country.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 August 15 is the day of national resurrection when the Korean people were reborn to be a dignified people who independently and creatively carve out their destiny after being freed from the yoke of colonial slavery. It marked a turning point in the history as the DPRK embarked on the new road of its own development as a full-fledged independent state.
					
					 The President's history of building a rich and powerful country is the history in which he paved a unique way of building socialism under the banner of the Juche idea, aroused the popular masses to bring about eye-opening miracles and changes in all the fields of the country and laid an eternal foundation ensuring the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 The socialist country built by the President is now greeting a great heyday of prosperity under the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK led by Kim Jong Il is an invincible socialist power fully demonstrating its dignity and might thanks to Songun and a promising country where the spirit of creation and leap forward runs high. 
					
					 The wishes of the President will be translated into a brilliant reality thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, who is successfully carrying forward the cause of building a rich and powerful country, and the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people around the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The daily calls for dynamically accelerating the general march for opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation full of confidence and optimism with the pride and honor of being members of the Kim Il Sung nation displaying the invincible national power under the banner of Songun and thus bringing about a great surge and great innovations unprecedented in the history of the country. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the DPRK is sure to emerge a victor in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation as long as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who is leading the building of a thriving socialist nation and the heroic people who worked miracles and feats in the struggle for the liberation of the country and its prosperity under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Greetings to Mauritanian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Mauritanian PM
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Kim Yong Il Friday sent a congratulatory message to Moulaye Ould Mohamed Laghdaf on his appointment as Prime Minister of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania.
					 In his message he expressed the belief that the long-standing friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries and wished him and the Mauritanian people great success in their work for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on the same day sent a similar message to Naha Mint Mouknass on her appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Mauritania.

articles.title: Delegation of World Peace Council Here
articles.content:
Delegation of World Peace Council Here
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the World Peace Council led by President Socorro Gomes arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Fascist Suppression Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Fascist Suppression Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the "council for  just debate at the National Assembly", the "Joint Measure Committee for the Frustration of the Suppression of the Socialist Workers' Federation and the Repeal of the National Security Law Which Violates the Freedom of Political Activities and Thinking" and the people's solidarities for the repeal of the "National Security Law" in south Korea held press conferences on August 11 and 12 to denounce the puppet authorities' fascist suppression.
					 The spokesman for the above-said council charged that the authorities' retaliation against unionists of Ssangyong Motor Co. is going beyond the limit. This is little short of "killing workers" and "killing a trade union" and this amounts to sparking off the second incident of Ssangyong Motor Co., he added.
					
					 He accused the Supreme Prosecutor's Office of attaching a political label to those workers who have been on strike to have their jobs protected for dozens of days.
					
					 He demanded the prosecution stop at once cooking up a case and the Lee Myung Bak regime halt at once the brutal suppression of workers of Ssangyong Motor Co.
					
					 The organizations blasted the prosecution brought a non-restraint complaint against eight members of the Socialist Workers' Federation including O Se Chol, honorary professor at Yonsei University, on charges of violation of the "National Security Law" by groundlessly linking them with the incident of Ssangyong Motor Co.
					
					 They charged that the authorities who made a wholesale arrest of workers of Ssangyong Motor Co. by branding them as a "violent group" are now working hard to invent a pretext for launching a wholesale campaign for cracking down upon workers by digging up again the "case of the Socialist Workers' Federation" which had already proved bankrupt. 
					
					 In a press release the organizations denounced the suppression of the struggle to defend the vital rights of the workers and political activities of members of the said federation as an act of violating the workers and other people's freedom of choice and freedom of political activities and thinking.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting, a photo exhibition, film shows and a lecture were held in Myanmar and Guinea on Aug. 7 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's start of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in the venues of functions were Kim Jong Il's works and photos showing his Songun leadership exploits.
					
					 The general director of the Myanmar Ministry of Sports who is secretary general of the Myanmar Olympic Committee said in his speech at a meeting that Kim Jong Il, regarding the military affair as the most important national affair, has defended the country, the revolution and socialism relying on the revolutionary spirit and the combat capability of the Korean People's Army and dynamically pushed forward the overall socialist construction. 
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people are sure to win in their struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership.
					
					 The chief secretary of the Union Solidarity and Development Association of Myanmar said at a photo exhibition and a film show that Kim Jong Il's idea and theory of attaching importance to the army are based on the Juche-oriented view and standpoint that an army plays a decisive role, adding that the Songun exploits performed by him would shine long with the history of the Juche-oriented army building.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea in a lecture titled "Korean People's Army, Mainstay of Socialist Cause" said that the KPA has been prepared to be a steadfast adherent to the socialist cause and its reliable guardian thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched the Korean films "75th Anniversary of Foundation of Heroic Korean People's Army" and "Army of the DPRK."

articles.title: Day of Korea's Liberation Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Korea's Liberation Observed in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Moscow on Aug. 11 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed in the venue of the meeting were works of the peerlessly great men and books on their exploits.
					
					 Present there were officials of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the Voice of Russia and others. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 Vorontsov, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, in his speech made at the meeting praised President Kim Il Sung as a benefactor of the Korean people's liberation as he liberated the usurped country and paved the road for national resurrection.
					
					Veredin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, said that Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, adding that his idea has been translated into a brilliant reality thanks to the unique Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Petrov, secretary of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, noted that today the DPRK's dignity and national power have reached the highest phase and the DPRK has demonstrated the might of an invincible socialist power thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Day of Korea's Liberation Observed in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Korea's Liberation Observed in Norway
 Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Torstein Engelskjon, chairman of the Norway-Korea Friendship Society, issued a statement on August 10 on the 64th anniversary of liberation of Korea.
					 The chairman said in his statement that President Kim Il Sung made long journeys of anti-Japanese bloody battles for two decades, crushing the brigandish Japanese imperialists and achieving the historic cause of national liberation on August 15, 1945.
					
					 Kim Il Sung dedicated his all to building the DPRK into a genuine people's country and the most dignified and prosperous socialist power in the world till the last moments of his great life, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The President was the founder of socialist Korea and a benevolent father of the Korean people.
					
					 His cause is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and has won one victory after another in the anti-imperialist struggle and the struggle to defend socialism by providing dynamic Songun leadership. 
					
					 The Korean people are now working hard to surely open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Norway-Korea Friendship Society sends full support to the Korean people in their struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Medvedev
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 15, con motivo del 64o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev.
					El mensaje  senala:
					
					Hago llegar mi saludo a usted y al pueblo ruso con motivo del 64o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea y expreso mi conviccion de que las relaciones entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente ruso
 Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el dia 15 el mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, en ocasion del dia de la liberacion de Corea.
					 El mensaje senala:
					
					 Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il
					
					 Con motivo del dia de liberacion de Corea, fiesta nacional del pueblo coreano, le envio a usted mi  sincera felicitacion.
					
					 El pueblo coreano alcanzo la libertad y la independencia mediante la heroica lucha contra el colonialismo.
					
					 Evaluamos el hecho de que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aprecia el recuerdo sobre los soldados del ejercito sovietico quienes dedicaron su vida para la derrota del militarismo japones en el Extremo Oriente.
					
					 Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il
					
					 Deseo a usted buena salud y felicidad y al pueblo coreano la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					Con consideracion.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung por el dia de liberacion de Corea
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung por el dia de liberacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 64 de la liberacion de Corea, tuvieron lugar las ceremonias de homenaje al pie de las estatuas de bronce del Presidente

					 Kim Il Sung.
					Ante su estatua de bronce erguida en la capitalina colina Mansu, estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Mientras se interpretaba la musica de la ocasion, fueron depositados los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, fabricas, empresas, granjas, escuelas, etc.
					
					Ademas, se ofrendo un cesto de flores a nombre de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					En las cintas de cestos se leian: "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung sera inmortal", "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung vive siempre en nosotros" y "!Las grandes hazanas revolucionarias del estimado Lider, generalisimo Kim Il Sung seran inmortales!"
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente ante su estatua de bronce.
					
					De otro lado, tuvieron lugar actos similares en varias unidades de esta capital y en las localidades donde se hallan las estatuas de bronce del Presidente.

articles.title: Periodicos exhortan a realizar la causa de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Periodicos exhortan a realizar la causa de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos insertaron el dia 15 editoriales dedicados al 64o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria (15 de agosto), exhortando a llevar a feliz termino la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung para la construccion de la patria prospera.
					El 15 de agosto es el dia de renacimiento de la nacion en que el pueblo coreano se hizo el digno que forja de manera independiente y creadora su destino desde la situacion de esclavo colonial y al mismo tiempo, es el punto de bifurcacion de la historia en que Corea comenzo a tomar un nuevo camino de su desarrollo, al ocupar la posicion digna de un estado soberano e independiente, subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en su editorial y continua:
					
					La historia de la construccion de la patria prospera del Presidente es la que bajo la bandera de la idea Juche abrio originalmente el camino hacia el socialismo, la que al movilizar a las masas populares logro los asombrosos milagros y cambios en todas las ramas del pais y la que echo el eterno cimiento para la prosperidad de todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					Nuestra patria socialista establecida por el Presidente acoge hoy la gran era dorada de potencia prospera bajo la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Esta patria, que disfruta de la guia del Dirigente, es la invencible potencia socialista que gracias al Songun exalta su dignidad y poderio y el pais prometedor donde predomina el impetu de creacion y salto.
					
					 Al contar con la direccion del Songun del Dirigente quien lleva adelante con brillantez la causa de construccion de la patria prospera del Presidente y con la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo en torno al Partido, el deseo del Presidente florecera como esplendida realidad sobre esta tierra.
					
					Con el orgullo y la dignidad de la nacion de            Kim Il Sung que bajo la bandera del Songun pone en pleno manifiesto el invencible poderio y llenos de la confianza y el optimismo debemos acelerar con mas vigor la marcha general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera y producir el gran salto y la gran innovacion sin precedentes en la historia de nuestra patria.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson destaca en su editorial  que es cierta la victoria en la construccion de gran potencia prospera gracias a la destacada direccion del Dirigente quien orienta a la cabeza la construccion de gran potencia prospera socialista y al heroico pueblo coreano que al enaltecer al gran Lider y al gran Dirigente, ha creado solo milagros y proezas tanto en la liberacion de la patria como en la lucha por su prosperidad.
